text: 2.33: Zo 14.26; FG 1.4; 5.31; 7.55-56; 10.45; Ef 4.8; Hi 10.12Zisas khavgiap, ana ntigem taagia Fhe Bakɨme han Hevenan ndagi. Ana ndav, Fhe Bakɨmen guva hareŋ ga perav mbur ki. Ana ntigem Fhe Bakɨme won Ŋina Ŋaarar ana nɨɨŋgi, ana fhum mba Ŋina Ŋaarar ana nɨɨn za suaŋgiap, ana ntigem anan ana nɨɨŋgi. Fhe Bakɨme mba Ŋina Ŋaarar ana nɨɨŋgim, ana ntigem mba Ŋina Ŋaara siav nza suagim, nza ana panan ŋgarim, nde ntigem ana mbui bigi garav ana buni mbararagi.
